admission process: The admission process involves submitting an online application, uploading academic documents, and attending counseling if required.
admission last date: The last date for admission submission is July 30th for the current academic year.
courses offered: We offer B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, B.Sc, BCA, MCA and various diploma programs.
engineering branches: Engineering branches include CSE, ECE, EEE, Mechanical, Civil, and Artificial Intelligence.
mba details: MBA program focuses on Finance, Marketing, HR, and Business Analytics.
library timings: The library is open from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM on working days.
hostel facility: Separate hostel facilities are available for boys and girls with 24/7 security.
canteen facility: The campus has a hygienic canteen serving breakfast, lunch, and snacks.
placement statistics: The average placement package is 4 LPA, and top recruiters visit every year.
top recruiters: Top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture, and Cognizant.
transport facility: Bus transport is available across major city routes.
sports facilities: The campus provides cricket, football, badminton, and indoor sports facilities.
fee structure: The annual tuition fee varies depending on the program chosen.
scholarships: Merit-based and need-based scholarships are available.
contact details: You can contact the admission office at admission@college.edu.
college location: The college is located in a well-connected urban area with public transport access.
campus area: The campus spans over 25 acres with modern infrastructure.
wifi availability: Free WiFi is available across the campus for students.
exam schedule: Examinations are conducted semester-wise as per academic calendar.
internship support: The placement cell assists students with internship opportunities.
alumni network: The college has a strong alumni network working in top companies.
research facilities: Advanced research labs are available for postgraduate students.
computer labs: Computer labs are equipped with latest hardware and licensed software.
attendance rules: Students must maintain a minimum of 75% attendance.
ragging policy: The campus follows strict anti-ragging policies.
faculty qualification: Faculty members are highly qualified with industry experience.
student clubs: Various technical and cultural clubs are active on campus.
annual fest: The annual cultural fest is conducted every year with various competitions.
library books: The library contains over 50,000 books and digital journals.
medical facility: On-campus medical assistance is available during working hours.
hostel fees: Hostel fees vary depending on room type and facilities provided.
campus timings: Campus is open from 8 AM to 6 PM.
grading system: The grading system follows a CGPA scale.
academic calendar: The academic calendar is released at the start of each year.
project support: Students receive faculty guidance for academic projects.
anti ragging committee: An anti-ragging committee ensures student safety.
student support: Counseling and mentorship programs are available.
career guidance: Career guidance sessions are conducted regularly.
online classes: Online classes are supported through LMS platforms.
exam results: Results are published on the official portal.
revaluation process: Students can apply for revaluation after results declaration.
campus security: The campus is secured with CCTV surveillance.
bank facility: ATM facility is available inside campus.
cultural activities: Various cultural programs are conducted throughout the year.
transport fees: Transport fees depend on travel distance.
faculty contact: Faculty contact details are available on the college website.
admission process:
Admissions are open for the 2026 academic year.

Students must fill out the online application form, upload required documents, and attend counseling if shortlisted.
courses offered:
We offer B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, BCA, MCA and B.Sc programs.

Each program includes practical labs, internships and industry exposure.
fees structure:
The annual tuition fee ranges from ₹75,000 to ₹1,50,000 depending on the program.

Scholarships are available for merit students.
hostel facility:
Separate hostels are available for boys and girls.

Facilities include Wi-Fi, mess, security and 24/7 water supply.
placements:
Our placement rate is 92%.

Top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture and Amazon.
transport:
College buses operate across the city.

Safe and affordable transportation is provided for students and staff.
